boilerplate.containers.HomePage.startInt: In an video interview, you would be given {readingTimeLimit} secs to read each question. When the countdown timer reaches "0", the system will automatically begin recording your response. And you'll be given a maximum of {answerTimeLimit} minutes per question to complete your response. Please note that there are no re-takes for Video Interviews and it will be a one-time through recording.
Your could try a Practice Interview before taking an actual interview.
Your could try a Practice Interview before taking an actual interview.
boilerplate.containers.HomePage.question: In the next page, you will be given {readingTimeLimit} seconds to read a Pratice Interview Question before your recording begins automatically.
There will be {numQuestions} questions to complete in this interview and you are given {answerTimeLimit} minutes per question.
When you are ready, please click "Next" button.
Submission Deadline: {deadline}
Next
boilerplate.containers.HomePage.Record.C: Please make sure camera and microphone on your pc work well before starting the test.
